viewData.name: Microsoft 15" Surface Book 2 Multi-Touch 2-in-1 Laptop (Silver)
viewData.short_description: Buy Microsoft 15" Surface Book 2 Multi-Touch 2-in-1 Laptop (Silver) featuring 1.9 GHz Intel Core i7-8650U Quad-Core, 16GB of RAM | 256GB SSD 15" 3240 x 2160 PixelSense Display. Review Microsoft Book 2
viewData.long_description: The silver Microsoft 15" Surface Book 2 Multi-Touch 2-in-1 Laptop is a high-performance laptop/tablet hybrid with power and versatility.
